content: Similar dilemma. I had my “family” gym (everyone in my family is on the plan and my parents paid for it!) which is close to my home and the gym I became a gym- goer in/love. I have the gym that’s included in my grad school tuition which is nice but neither close to home nor school so while its “free”, I was rarely able to go consistently because it was such a time suck in my already full- load. Then I joined a gym that’s positioned exactly in front of the train station that I use to get home from school and now have NO excuse not to go — it’s convenient located. Even if the money doesn’t make sense, my health and sanity are worth it.
